item.title: 343. Integer Break
item.description: LeetCode problem 343 Problem Statement Given a positive integer n, our task is to divide it into the sum of ( k ) positive integers, where ( k \geq 2 ), in such a way that the product of these integers is maximized. Our goal is to determine the maximum possible product. Naive Solution A straightforward or naive way to solve this would be to consider all potential combinations to divide the number n and calculate the product for each division.
